verbose_text: Alizarin red staining of TGF-beta- and PDGF stimulated cells revealed that the TGF-beta (5 ng/ml)-induced matrix mineralization was enhanced by PDGF (10 ng/ml), whereas PDGF alone did not induce mineralization (XREF_FIG).
evidence: TGF-beta (5 ng/ml)-induced matrix mineralization was enhanced by PDGF
